alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Clinton, southern Grand Isle, northwestern Chittenden and southwestern Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beekmantown, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plattsburgh International Airport, Plattsburgh, Beekmantown, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Georgia, Grand Isle, St. Albans Town, North Hero, Milton, South Hero, Jericho, Dannemora, Georgia Center, Fairfield, Westford, Isle La Motte, Colchester, Fletcher and Swanton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 99 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
